channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Excessive leaves on pavement, 30th October
item.description:
Outside number 27 and 28 there seems to be an excessive amount lf leaves collected up making the pavement extremely slippery and dangerous. The section is used by multiple disabled residents on the street which puts them at risk lf serious injury as well as children and the general public. The rest of the pavement is not as bad as this section.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badsworth Road, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Pothole, 30th October
item.description:

item.title: Constant banging noise, 30th October
item.description:
Constant loud banging noise, likely from upstairs, every day and night until 3–4 a.m. It’s happening now (8:55 p.m.). My baby wakes up and my 7-year-old gets scared. We can’t sleep and it’s affecting our wellbeing. Please investigate and stop this noise.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Warwick Grove, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins are stacked into the bin space, with no access to fill them; 3 bins remain on the pavement with black bins posted next to them, 30th October
item.description:
